TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridTextBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 在 儲存格中裝載 控制項以編輯字串。

span.span: Hosts a control in a cell of a for editing strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自`abstract`類別。The class derives from the `abstract` class . 在執行階段主機可讓使用者編輯文字的控制項。At run time, the hosts a control that allows users to edit text. 特殊屬性加入至類別包含，和。Special properties added to the class include , and . 這些屬性可讓您存取裝載控制項和其屬性以及設定來顯示值的格式。These properties allow you to access the hosted control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values. 如果資料來源包含物件，屬性應該設定為以邏輯方式可編輯的文字方塊控制項中的資料類型。If the data source is a containing objects, the property of the should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control. 下列資料類型會自動與關聯: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following data types are automatically associated with a : , , , , , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > Visual basic 不完全支援下列類型： ， ， ， ，和。The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: , , , , and . （不允許運算子。）(Operators are not allowed.) ## Examples 下列範例會建立並將它加入的。The following example creates a and adds it to the of a . 若要執行此程式碼範例，將它貼到的表單名為`dataGrid1`呼叫的建構函式從。To run this code example, paste it into a form that has a named `dataGrid1` and call it from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查以確定確實發生的編輯。The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring. 如果是的話，它會適當格式化值。If so, it formats the value appropriately. 如果值為`null`，此方法會進入插入資料行; 否則它會使用; 方法來認可值。If the value is `null`, the method enters into the column; otherwise, it uses the method to commit the value. 方法會呼叫編輯作業時，認可。The method is called by the when an editing operation is committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 站台上正在編輯之儲存格位置方格控制項。The sites a control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited. 方法會呼叫類別的開始編輯作業時的方法。The method is called by the class's method when an editing operation is about to begin. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以變更的已按下 儲存格的文字控制項。The following example uses the method to change the text of a clicked cell in the control. summary.span: 取得或設定字元，指定如何格式化文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.

value.span: 用來指定如何格式化文字的字元。

span.span: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定資料行中值的顯示方式。The property specifies how values are displayed in the column. 例如，將屬性設定為"c"，以指定的值將會格式化為當地貨幣。For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency. 的電腦用來判斷實際的貨幣格式。The for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format. 當資料變更時，所自動格式化成原生類型的值。The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed. 如需有關格式化字元，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 您所套用的格式應該是適用於資料類型。The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type. 比方說，如果資料為數值在本質上可使用其中一個數值格式字串。For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings. 您可以變更for藉由設定屬性，以新建構適當的文化特性 id 的執行個體You can change the for a by setting the property to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. 若要設定對於應用程式，將屬性新物件建構適當的文化特性 id 的執行個體To set the for the application, set the property of the object to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，並將其指派給屬性物件。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 此範例也會設定"c"會指定資料行應該顯示為貨幣值的屬性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定特定的文化特性 (Culture) 資訊，用來決定如何格式化數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，例如 類別。

span.span: An object that implements the interface, such as the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時屬性的格式化字元，其中一個會使用所提供的資訊屬性，以進一步指定要使用何種文化特性特定格式。When setting the property to one of the formatting characters, the uses the information provided by the property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use. 例如，當屬性設定為格式字元"c"（適用於貨幣），您可以進一步指定用於里拉的符號。For example, when the property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used. 若要這樣做，請建立新義大利的地區設定識別碼與物件，並設定屬性，以新物件。To do this, create a new object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the property to the new object. 如需有關格式化字元，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，並將其指派給屬性物件。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 此範例也會設定"c"會指定資料行應該顯示為貨幣值的屬性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]
